function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of human wastewater to track diseases","Impact":"Inaccurate prevalence estimations, delayed detection of cases","Mitigation":"Implementation of additional surveillance methods, public health awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Wastewater treatment and monitoring technologies","People":"Community members, public health officials","Owner":"Public health authorities"},{"Description":"Reliance on sewage-based monitoring for disease detection","Impact":"Inaccurate detection of infection spikes, delayed response to outbreaks","Mitigation":"Integration with individual patient-based tests, development of more sensitive monitoring methods","Technologies":"Sewage monitoring technology, individual patient-based testing","People":"Public health officials, researchers","Owner":"Public health authorities"},{"Description":"Monitoring wastewater effluents from hospitals for virus spread","Impact":"Potential misinformation about the extent of virus spread from hospitals","Mitigation":"Integration with broader community data, public health education on hospital wastewater management","Technologies":"Wastewater monitoring and treatment technologies","People":"Hospital staff, public health officials","Owner":"Public health authorities"}]}
